name: Between Tigris and Euphrates
preparation:
Add all the ingredients except the cream to a shaker and dry-shake.
Add the vanilla-tahini whipped cream to top.
*Vanilla-tahini whipped cream: Add 1 barspoon of 
 de Madagascar liqueur and 1 barspoon of tahini paste to 2 oz heavy whipping cream to a shaker, and shake for 30 seconds.
